thread.title: Floyd Mayweather's luxury cars go up in flames [Video]
thread.title_full: Floyd Mayweather's luxury cars go up in flames [Video]

title: Floyd Mayweather's luxury cars go up in flames [Video]
text:
Floyd Mayweather denies doping violation before Manny Pacquiao bout 
Floyd Mayweather, Jr. is nursing a bruised ego after four of his luxury cars went up in flames in an incident in Arizona. 
The undefeated boxing champion had hired bosses at his usual transportation firm, Fusion Luxury Motors, to move his pricey car collection from Las Vegas to Miami, Fla., on Wednesday when the truck's two trailers became engulfed in flames just outside Phoenix. 
Photos obtained by editors at TMZ.com show all of the vehicles being transported, including Mayweather's Bentley, a custom Jeep and two Rolls Royce cars, completely burnt out. 
Arizona State Troopers have revealed no one was injured in the fire, which is currently under investigation. 
Representatives for Mayweather, Jr., who was recently spotted on vacation in Bora Bora with Justin Bieber, and Fusion Luxury Motors have yet to comment on the incident. Sponsored Links
